title: Looking for a duo Partner (nearly out of bronze)
body: Add me on OCE. Looking to duo with someone to get to silver

replies.body: ur b3, this is where bronze becomes difficult to climb
how does it become "difficult". i thought all of bronze was much the same
Nope higher bronze means you start vs silver... low silver is full of people that just hit 30 and played their placements so they have much lower game knowledge
